item.title: About
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
Hi! I’m Adam and I hope you can get some value out of the collection of information I’m building here. I’m currently a Software Development Engineer in Test with Workiva during the day and during the evenings I’m learning about a variety of subjects, relaxing, or honing some kind of skill. I would like to keep primarily focused on software development, but since this is the About section, I’ll list the other things that might come up every once in a while and below is a timeline of my experience with development.

Subjects

  • Yoga/Somatics â˜‹ Running â˜Š Biking â˜‹ Health
  • Software Development â˜Š Electronics
  • Pokemon GO â˜‹ Drumming
  • Photography â˜Š Travel
  • Finance â˜‹ Psychology
  • Tea â˜Š Coffee
